message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life - which is the definition of depreciation.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see there is a line item specifically called "Depreciation" with a value of 120970.16 on 2024-02-05.

This is exactly what I'm looking for since depreciation represents the systematic allocation of the cost of tangible assets over their useful lives.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '120970.16'} }
```
